code: import{useEffect}from"react";export function BackgroundStars(){useEffect(()=>{console.log("⭐ Tworzenie kropek");const starCount=40;const container=document.createElement("div");container.classList.add("stars-container");document.body.appendChild(container);for(let i=0;i<starCount;i++){const star=document.createElement("div");star.classList.add("star");star.style.top="".concat(Math.random()*100,"vh");star.style.left="".concat(Math.random()*100,"vw");star.style.animationDelay="".concat(Math.random()*3,"s");star.style.setProperty("--moveX","".concat(Math.random()*20-10,"px"));star.style.setProperty("--moveY","".concat(Math.random()*20-10,"px"));container.appendChild(star);}return()=>container.remove();},[]);return null;}
